scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w functions
scripts.dev:functions: npm run seed:local:exec && npm run serve -w functions
scripts.dev:functions:admin: npm run seed:local:admin:exec && npm run serve:admin -w functions
scripts.seed:local:exec: npx firebase-tools emulators:exec --project demo-mahjong-club --only firestore,auth --export-on-exit=.emulator-seed "npm run seed:local -w functions"
scripts.seed:local:admin:exec: npx firebase-tools emulators:exec --project demo-mahjong-club --only firestore,auth --export-on-exit=.emulator-seed-admin "npm run seed:local:admin -w functions"
scripts.check:all: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w functions && npm run test -w functions && npm run test -w apps/web && npm run test:e2e -w apps/web
